name: The Adventures of Placeholder Man in the Dungeons of Programmer Art
name_original: The Adventures of Placeholder Man in the Dungeons of Programmer Art
description:
this is designed for controllers so the keyboard is gonna suck. download the exe to use a controller

buttons:

WASD/Arrow Keys: move
Left Click/Z: sword
Right Click/X: use item

Esc: item menu (use the arrow keys to select an item, clicking is just glitchy)

Space: interact with objects

Items:

Gun: does gun things

Telekinesis: pick up rocks with telekinetic powers. the circle shows your range. press the button again to drop
